payload.subject: Website concept for W TOITURE
payload.textContent:
Subject: Website concept for W TOITURE

Hi there,

I’m reaching out proactively because I found your details via Gouden Gids (goudengids.be). I also noticed that W TOITURE doesn’t currently have a website. That’s why I already created a first website concept, so you can immediately see how your online presence could look — professional and convincing.

View the demo: https://websouffle.github.io/w-toiture-2026/

My goal is simple: help you gain more visibility and inquiries with a strong, clear website at a market‑conform price with transparent costs.

What you get

Free website design (look & feel): you receive the full design for free so you can judge without risk whether it matches your expectations.

Professional delivery by Websoufflé: after approval, I turn the design into a fast, user‑friendly website that can grow with your needs.

Transparent monthly costs

Domain (.be): € 6.99 / month
Hosting / server: € 22.00 / month
Total: € 28.99 / month
(Prices excl. VAT where applicable.)

I do this through Websoufflé as a side business, using my technical experience from my day job at Cegeka and Napoleon Games to help entrepreneurs build a professional online presence — practical, fast, and correctly delivered.

If you’re interested, we can keep it simple:
Feel free to share your first feedback on the demo (what you like and what you’d change) and I’ll prepare a tailored proposal for W TOITURE.
You can also reply with 2–3 time slots that work for you, and I’ll schedule something.

Best regards,
Kengy Van Hijfte
Websoufflé – custom web development
E: hello@websouffle.com
T: +32476607441
W: https://www.websouffle.com/en/page/home
Personal site: https://kengy.be
VAT: BE0789542089
